Local exploit
-------------

Microsoft Windows Telephony Service Local Privilege Escalation (MS05-040)

Tested on: 
 Windows NT 4.0 SP6a  Server/Workstation   English/French
 Windows 2000   SP4   Server/Professional  English/French
 Windows XP     SP1   Professional         English/French

References:
 http://www.microsoft.com/technet/security/Bulletin/MS05-040.mspx
 
CVE:
 CVE-2005-0058
 http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2005-0058
